services.title: Full Lawn Leaf Removal
services.desc: Let’s keep your yard feeling cozy and clean! I’ll carefully remove fallen leaves so your outdoor space stays tidy, inviting, and ready to enjoy.

services.title: Snow Removal
services.desc: Let’s keep your home safe and cozy this winter! I’ll clear snow with care so your driveway and walkways stay clean, easy to use, and welcoming for everyone who visits.

services.title: Seasonal Contracts
services.desc: Enjoy peace of mind all season long! I offer flexible daily and weekly service plans for fall and winter, making sure leaves are cleared and snow is handled before it becomes a hassle. Your outdoor space stays clean, safe, and welcoming—no matter the weather.

services.title: Lawn Mowing
services.desc: Keep your lawn lush, green, and perfectly trimmed! I’ll mow your yard carefully so it looks neat and healthy all season long, giving your home a fresh and inviting curb appeal.

services.title: Garden Care
services.desc: Let your garden flourish! I’ll weed, trim, and maintain your flower beds and shrubs so your outdoor space blooms beautifully and stays vibrant throughout spring and summer.

services.title: Seasonal Lawn Plans
services.desc: Enjoy a worry-free lawn this spring and summer! I offer flexible weekly or bi-weekly service plans to keep your yard tidy, healthy, and ready for family gatherings, playtime, or relaxation.
